biotools.summary: An alignment software for targeted proteomics (SRM or SWATH-MS) data. It uses a graph-based alignment strategy based on non-linear retention time correction to integrate information from all available runs. The input consists of a set of csv files derived from a targeted proteomics experiment generated by OpenSWATH (using either mProphet or pyProphet) or generated by Peakview.

bioschemas.name: TRIC
